TEXT.TITLE: PAKISTAN INVITES TENDERS FOR 15,000 TONNES RICE
TEXT.BODY: Rice Export Corp of Pakistan Ltd said it had invited tenders up to May 7 for the export of 15,000 tonnes of rice from the 1985-86 (November/March) crop. REUTER
